text: We'll show you how to navigate
the BlockFi app, buy and sell crypto,
and withdraw funds.
We'll also show different ways
to earn interest on your crypto.

This video is about how to
use the BlockFi website,
not how to invest.

How you choose to invest
your money is your decision.
Use the clickable sections below

to skip to different
parts of this tutorial.
Once you've set up your account,
let's show you around the dashboard.
You'll see your total account balance here
and the total interest you've earned here.
Your accrued interest can be found here.
Here, you can see details
for a BlockFi back-to-reward credit card
if you choose to have one.
Scroll down to see the market data

of various cryptocurrencies,
such as their price
and the daily fluctuation of their value.

Here, you can see any
active loans you may have.
Also, you can refer a friend
by clicking here to earn a reward.

Scroll further to see
your transaction history.

You can use the tabs at the
top to open pages to deposit,
trade, withdraw, or borrow.

Click here to view or adjust
your account settings.
Click on "Trade,"
make sure your bank account is connected,

and then you can choose
which cryptocurrency
you want to purchase.

Input the amount you want
to purchase in US dollars
and press "Buy."
You can then click "Repeat Trade"
for a reoccurring buy option,
where you can purchase this amount
every day, week, or month.
We're going to choose one time only.

You'll now see your purchased
cryptocurrency under Accounts,
as well as the interest rates,

total interest earned,
and accrued interest.

To withdraw your funds, click
here and follow the prompts.
You can change your interest preferences
to earn all of your interest
in the cryptocurrency of your choosing.

Click on profile settings,
click on interest,
and you'll be able to choose
what currency you want to get paid out in.
You can choose same assets held,
or if you want to consolidate

all those interest payments
into one specific currency,
such as bitcoin, you can.
